title: Jackie Stewart / 'Weekend Of A Champion' Film - /SHAKEDOWN Trackdown
description:
Leo Parente and /ShakeDown interview Sir Jackie Stewart as he promotes the release of the re-cut Roman Polanski film, 'Weekend of a Champion' - An inside look at Jackie's 1971 Monaco GP experiences.  Sir Jackie, in the film and this interview, share much about what makes for success, racing safety, and motorsport itself.  "Weekend Of A Champion," in theaters and on Netflix, also prompts a /ShakeDown question to you: What makes a great racing film?
